Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. George Muzahim:

Text.Language: Gewrgioc piremzahim: e~tafsep hannis] n~qici: eybe pefmei m~P,#c#: af[i n~]metmarturia~.
George Muzahim: who accepted great sufferings: because of his love for Christ: He received martyrdom.

His father was a Pagan: He took his mother against her will: because she was a Christian: She taught him great virtues.

Hail to him who was beheaded: cut in pieces, he was martyred: Fire did not affect him: he received joyful glory.
